recommendations.title: Improve Overall WCAG Compliance
recommendations.description: Your site's WCAG compliance score is 50%, which is below the recommended 70% minimum.
actions: Focus on fixing critical accessibility violations first
Implement a systematic approach to accessibility testing
Consider accessibility training for your development team

recommendations.title: Fix Axe-core Violations
recommendations.description: Found 5 accessibility violations that need attention.
actions: Review detailed axe-core violations in the test results
Prioritize high and critical impact issues
Use browser extensions for real-time axe testing

recommendations.title: Address Pa11y Issues
actions: Review pa11y error details for specific fixes
Focus on WCAG 2.1 AA compliance issues

recommendations.title: Improve Keyboard Navigation
